statements: SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE condition_name = 'Control';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT experiment_id, condition_name, timestamp FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value < 0.3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE condition_name = 'Treatment';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT experiment_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE condition_name = 'Control' ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT DISTINCT condition_name FROM performance_metrics
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_value, condition_name FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY condition_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 0.5
SELECT experiment_id, condition_name, timestamp FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM experiment_conditions;
SELECT condition_name, startTime, endTime FROM experiment_conditions WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM metrics WHERE experiment_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%experiment%';
SELECT AVG(metric_value), MAX(metric_value), MIN(metric_value) FROM metrics WHERE experiment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM experiment_conditions WHERE startTime >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT condition_name, endTime FROM experiment_conditions
SELECT experiment_id, condition_name, startTime, endTime FROM experiment_conditions ORDER BY startTime DESC
SELECT * FROM metrics WHERE metric_value > 50 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT experiment_id, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM metrics GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING avg_metric_value > 30 ORDER BY experiment_id
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_conditions WHERE condition_name='Control';
SELECT experiment_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT experiment_id, condition_name, experiment_description FROM experiment_conditions WHERE condition_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, metric_name FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT condition_name, metric_name FROM performance_metrics INNER JOIN experiment_results ON performance_metrics.experiment_id = experiment_results.experiment_id ORDER BY condition_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'accuracy';
SELECT * FROM experiment_conditions WHERE condition_id IN (SELECT condition_id FROM experiment_results WHERE experiment_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM experiment_conditions;
SELECT condition_name, metric_value FROM experiment_conditions ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, description FROM metrics WHERE metric_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM experiment_metrics WHERE value >= 50 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT condition_name, metric_value FROM experiment_conditions WHERE metric_value > 5;

SELECT experiment_name, metric_name FROM experiments JOIN experiment_metrics ON experiments.experiment_id = experiment_metrics.experiment_id JOIN metrics ON experiment_metrics.metric_id = metrics.metric_id;
SELECT AVG(metric_value), MAX(metric_value), MIN(metric_value) FROM experiment_conditions;
SELECT * FROM experiment_conditions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT condition_name, metric1 FROM experiment_conditions WHERE metric2 > 100;
SELECT id, participant_name, participant_age FROM experiment_participants WHERE participant_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM experiment_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_city FROM experiment_locations WHERE location_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM experiment_conditions WHERE metric1 > 50;
SELECT experiment_id, result_value, result_date FROM experiment_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM experiment_participants WHERE participant_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT location_name, location_city, location_address FROM experiment_locations WHERE location_city = 'New York';
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_date FROM experiment_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
